unit.name: Physics
unit.standards_description: Students will learn about various concepts in physics.

name: Force, Motion, and Energy
expectations: Students will use a ballista to learn about force, motion, and energy.

unit.standards_description: Students will integrate programming into their Defense Against the Dark Arts courses.

name: The Boggart
expectations: The Boggart is a creature that takes the form of someone's greatest fear. Students will learn about if-else conditions and logic to simulate this.
